src:
Drl se je na svojo mamo, umirili ga niso niti policisti
Odpeljali so ga na hladno.
06 Nov 2019, 10:07 by T. V.
NOVO MESTO – Policiste PP Novo mesto so v nedeljskih jutranjih urah poklicali na pomoč iz naselja v okolici Novega mesta, kjer je pijan 26-letnik vpil na svojo mater in jo ogrožal.Moški se tudi po prihodu policistov ni pomiril in ni upošteval njihovih ukazov, zato so mu odvzeli prostost in ga odpeljali v prostore za pridržanje. Zaradi kršitev javnega reda in miru so mu izdali plačilni nalog.
text:
He was yelling at his mother, and not even the police officers calmed him down
They took him out in the cold.
06 Nov 2019, 10:07 by T.V.
NEW CITY - Police officers of Novo mesto Police Station were called for help Sunday morning from a neighborhood in Novo mesto, where a drunken 26-year-old yelled at his mother and threatened her. therefore, he was taken into custody and taken to the detention facilities. He was issued a payment order for violations of law and order.
